timeline.bodyText:
The reason we have queryExceptions here in the VerificationContext, is that we eventually calls VerificationContext.getQueryFailures to gather the list of all exceptions seen during verification of a test cases, including the retries. Adding clientExceptions here but not using it is not helpful.
Instead, we should create a subclass of QueryException, and make ClientException the cause of it.
timeline.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: This, along with this class, to be unchanged?

timeline.bodyText: Having nested retry could drastically increase the max retry time because they're multiplicative. What about retry request throttling as part of the cluster connection retry?
